text: Communication service providers want
to take advantage of cloud benefits
for their telecom networks,
but it's complicated to map traditional
network setup processes to a cloud environment.
AWS Telco Network Builder makes it easier and faster
to deploy and manage telecom networks on AWS
while still using telecom industry standards.
Communication service providers define
network requirements using standard industry language,
and AWS Telco Network Builder maps them
to a cloud architecture
and provisions the right resources automatically.
Lifecycle management is simplified
as AWS Telco Network Builder integrates
with standard telecom network
and service management systems
to update and upgrade network functions and services.
AWS Telco Network Builder provides a centralized dashboard
so communication service providers can monitor
and manage their networks.
Accelerate the journey to the cloud
and create a more efficient telecom network
with AWS Telco Network Builder.
